thiefworld.main

Class DisplayUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.main.DisplayUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    final class DisplayUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable
    Updates the GUI display, configuring and adding the required visual elements at each step.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea
